doc.title: At 8 AM
doc.plot: The time and date is set for Shannon, played by Anne Sostman, to meet her biological mother for the first time. A meeting that she has dreamt about her whole life. With her best friend Suzanne along for support, played by Kit Rich, they sit and wait for this mysterious woman to arrive. In this waiting period, the story unravels as Shannon learns that her best friend has kept a very important secret from her that she can't hold in any longer. A heartwarming story about love, friendship and tons of regret.
